headline: Is It Worth Investing in Leidos (LDOS) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Leidos (LDOS) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Here's Why You Should Add Leidos Stock to Your Portfolio Right Now
summary: LDOS makes a strong case for investment in the Aerospace sector, given its solid earnings growth prospects, an impressive return on equity and rising backlog.
